message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.CR

This paper is about person re-identification using deep learning, which is a computer vision task. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a self-training method with progressive augmentation, which involves optimizing the network and improving the feature representations, indicating that machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) are also relevant sub-categories. Additionally, the paper deals with cross-domain person re-identification, which involves transferring knowledge from one domain to another, suggesting that multimedia (cs.MM) and cryptography and security (cs.CR) could also be relevant sub-categories.
